header.p: Xenofarm is currently deployed in four different projects.

ul.li:
Pike
Pike is a general purpose programming language and the longest user of Xenofarm, since Xenofarm was originally written for testing Pike. Result pages for Pikefarm can be found here.

LysKOM Server
LysKOM is a communication system that combines the best aspects of ICQ and news into a system that more or less predates them both. Result pages for LysKOM can be found here.

Python
Python is another general purpose programming language that also uses Xenofarm, in a project they call Snake Farm, to find portability problems. There are result pages both for development python and for the stable python.

ArgoUML
ArgoUML is a Java based modeling tool for UML distributed with the BSD License. It is able to create and save most of the nine standard UML diagrams. ArgoUML also has the ability to reverse engineer correct Java code and generate UML diagrams for it. See the result page for details on how the xenofarm builds are doing.
